snippet: The last-minute order came less than a day before officials in the state were to begin providing marriage licenses to gay couples.
abstract: Supreme Court issues last-minute order delaying same-sex marriages in Virginia, day before state officials were to begin providing marriage licenses to gay couples; right of same-sex couples to marry has been granted in 19 states and District of Columbia, and lawsuits are pending in all states where bans remain.
lead_paragraph: The last-minute order came less than a day before officials in the state were to begin providing marriage licenses to gay couples.

headline.main: Supreme Court Delays Gay Marriage in Virginia, a Day Before It Was Set to Begin
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Delays Gay Marriage in Virginia, a Day Before It Was Set to Begin

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
